title: Estimate value of definite integral from table

content.prompt: The table above gives selected values for a continuous function f. If f is increasing over the closed interval [ 0,3], which of the following could be the value of âˆ« 0 3 f ( x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F91@ ?

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
